# AgentOps

> AgentOps is the developer favorite platform for testing, debugging, and deploying AI agents and LLM apps. Monitor, analyze, and optimize your agent workflows with comprehensive observability and analytics.

## Core Documentation

- [Introduction](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/introduction) - Getting started with AgentOps
- [Quickstart Guide](https://docs.agentops.ai/v1/quickstart) - Start using AgentOps with just 2 lines of code
- [Core Concepts](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/concepts/core-concepts) - Understanding AgentOps fundamentals
- [SDK Reference](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/usage/sdk-reference) - Complete SDK documentation
- [Dashboard Guide](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/usage/dashboard-info) - Using the AgentOps dashboard

## Usage & Features

- [Tracking Agents](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/usage/tracking-agents) - Monitor agent behavior and performance
- [Recording Operations](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/usage/recording-operations) - Track operations and workflows
- [LLM Call Tracking](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/usage/tracking-llm-calls) - Monitor LLM API calls
- [Trace Management](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/usage/manual-trace-control) - Advanced trace control
- [Context Managers](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/usage/context-managers) - Python context manager usage
- [Decorators](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/concepts/decorators) - Using AgentOps decorators

## Integrations

- [OpenAI](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/openai) - OpenAI API integration
- [Anthropic](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/anthropic) - Anthropic Claude integration
- [LangChain](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/langchain) - LangChain framework integration
- [LangGraph](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/langgraph) - LangGraph workflow integration
- [CrewAI](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/crewai) - CrewAI multi-agent integration
- [AutoGen](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/autogen) - Microsoft AutoGen integration
- [AG2](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/ag2) - AG2 agent framework integration
- [OpenAI Agents SDK](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/openai_agents_python) - OpenAI Agents SDK integration
- [LlamaIndex](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/llamaindex) - LlamaIndex RAG integration
- [Google Generative AI](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/integrations/google_generative_ai) - Google Gemini integration

## Examples

- [OpenAI Examples](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/examples/openai) - OpenAI integration examples
- [LangChain Examples](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/examples/langchain) - LangChain usage examples
- [CrewAI Examples](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/examples/crewai) - Multi-agent CrewAI examples
- [AutoGen Examples](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/examples/autogen) - Microsoft AutoGen examples
- [Anthropic Examples](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/examples/anthropic) - Anthropic Claude examples
- [All Examples](https://docs.agentops.ai/v2/examples/examples) - Complete examples collection

## Repository & Community

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/AgentOps-AI/agentops) - Source code and issues
- [Contributing Guide](https://github.com/AgentOps-AI/agentops/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) - How to contribute
- [Discord Community](https://discord.gg/FagdcwwXRR) - Join our Discord server
- [AgentOps Dashboard](https://app.agentops.ai/) - Access the web dashboard
- [Documentation](https://docs.agentops.ai) - Complete documentation site
